caption.p: Projected changes in a number of months in the Transmission Window (TW) for malaria ( Pv and Pf) transmission by the 2030s as compared to baseline years. New foci of malaria transmission in the states of Jammu & Kashmir, Uttarakhand and Himachal Pradesh particularly for P vivax, while a reduction in parts of Orissa and Gujarat are visible. Increase in the transmission of P. falciparum by one month in the central part of India is discernible.
